banner.title: This site uses cookies
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience.

preferences.title: Cookie preferences
preferences.description: Choose which types of cookies you want to allow.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the site to function.

settings.aboutDescription: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and French regulations, we inform you about the use of cookies on our site.
settings.consentValidity: Your consent is valid for 6 months. You can change your preferences at any time on this page.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the site to function. They enable authentication, security, and basic navigation. They cannot be disabled.
necessary.examples: User session, CSRF tokens, language preferences

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.description: These cookies improve user experience by remembering your choices and preferences (theme, layout, display options).

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how you use our site to improve it. Data is anonymized and aggregated.
analytics.examples: Pages visited, time spent, user journey

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to offer you personalized advertising content based on your interests.

settings.rightsDescription: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:

rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification of your data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure of your data
rights.objection: Right to object to the processing of your data
rights.withdraw: Right to withdraw your consent at any time

registry.title: üìã Detailed Cookie Registry
registry.description: Complete list of all cookies that may be used on this site, by category.
registry.note: Third-party cookies will only be set if you give your explicit consent. Necessary cookies are essential for the site to function and cannot be refused.

purposes.fb_pixel_tracking: Facebook Pixel - Conversion tracking and targeted advertising
purposes.fb_cross_site_tracking: Facebook - Stores and tracks visits across websites
purposes.google_ads_retargeting: Google Ads - Advertising tracking and retargeting
purposes.google_ads_cookie_test: Google Ads - Tests if browser accepts cookies

history.title: üìú Your Consent History
history.noHistory: No consent history available. Your future preferences will be recorded here.
history.gdprNote: This history proves that you have given (or refused) your consent in an informed manner. This data is retained for audit purposes and can be deleted by deleting your account.

checklist.title: Getting Started Guide
checklist.confirmSkip: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial? You can restart it from settings.

step1.title: Edit Mode
step1.description: Discover edit mode to easily modify your CV
step1.tooltip: üëâ Click here to edit your CV!

screen1.title: Create your "master" CV
screen1.description: The idea is simple: create a CV as complete as possible with all your experiences, skills and education. The more detailed your CV, the better AI can filter it for each job offer.
checklist: AI extracts the best for each offer
screen1.tip: Think "Mega CV": list everything, AI will sort it for you. Do it once, the magic happens afterward.

screen2.title: You have full control!
screen2.description: Your CV belongs to you. Modify it as you wish, section by section.
screen2.subtitle: 3 actions at your disposal:

edit.title: Edit
edit.description: Edit the content of any section in one click

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Remove what is no longer relevant

add.title: Add
add.description: Complete your CV with new experiences, education, languages, projects or extras

screen2.tip: The richer your CV, the more AI has to work with.

screen3.title: Two sections not to neglect

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: List your professional AND personal projects. A side-project, an open source contribution, a student project... everything counts for AI.

extra.title: Extra
extra.description: Fill in your additional information: hobbies and interests, availability, remote work preference, mobility, driver's license...

screen3.tip: This info helps AI better target the offers that match you.

step2.title: AI Generation
step2.description: Generate a tailored CV with AI
step2.tooltip: ‚ú® Adapt your CV to job offers with AI

screen1.title: Generate tailored CVs in a few clicks
screen1.description: The heart of FitMyCV: your job offers. Add them, AI handles the rest. It analyzes each offer, extracts key information and adapts your CV automatically.
screen1.subtitle: 2 ways to start:

existing.title: Start from an existing CV
existing.description: Select your most complete CV. The more detailed it is, the more precisely AI can adapt it to each job offer.

template.title: Create a template from the offer
template.description: Generate a CV template based on the job offer to inspire you and compose your own.

screen1.tip: No need to copy-paste the offers content. Paste links or import PDFs, AI extracts everything automatically.

screen2.title: One job offer = One tailored CV
screen2.description: Add as many offers as you want. For each one, AI generates a perfectly tailored CV.

url.title: By URL
url.description: Paste your job offer links. AI opens each page and extracts information automatically.

pdf.title: By PDF
pdf.description: Import offers that were sent to you or that you saved.

historyBlock.title: History
historyBlock.description: Find all previously used offers. Reuse them to generate new CVs without searching again.

screen3.title: AI adapts, it doesn't invent
screen3.description: AI doesn't fabricate fake experiences. It filters your generic CV to keep only what matters for the job offer.
screen3.subtitle: Specifically, AI will:
checklist: Filter experiences and skills relevant to the offer
Remove what's unnecessary to avoid overloading the CV
Rephrase using the job offer's vocabulary (ATS-friendly)
Detect missing skills justifiable by your background
Determine your level for each added skill
screen3.tip: Result: a targeted, streamlined CV perfectly aligned with what the recruiter is looking for.

step3.title: Task Manager
step3.description: Track the progress of your background tasks
step3.tooltip: üîÑ Your CV is being generated. Track progress here.

step4.title: Open Generated CV
step4.description: Open and view your generated CV
step4.tooltip: ‚úÖ Your new CV is ready! Click here to open it

step5.title: Match Score
step5.description: Calculate compatibility with a job offer
step5.tooltip: üéØ Calculate your CV's compatibility with a job offer
step5.fallbackMessage: This step requires an associated job offer. Would you like to skip it?

step6.title: AI Optimization
step6.tooltip: üöÄ Optimize your CV to increase your score

screen1.title: Measure your compatibility with the offer
screen1.description: For each generated CV, get a match score indicating how well your profile matches the recruiter's expectations.
screen1.subtitle: The detailed analysis shows you:

breakdown.title: Score breakdown
breakdown.description: Understand what works and what can be improved

validated.title: Validated skills
validated.description: What your CV already covers for the job offer

missing.title: Missing skills
missing.description: What the recruiter is looking for that doesn't appear yet

improvements.title: Improvement points
improvements.description: Concrete recommendations to boost your score

screen1.tip: A high score = more chances of being noticed by the recruiter.

screen2.title: Apply improvements instantly
screen2.description: No need to modify everything manually. AI can apply recommendations directly to your CV in one click.
checklist: Vocabulary adjustment for the job offer
screen2.subtitle: Full transparency:
screen2.transparencyText: Each modification is recorded in the history with its justification. You know exactly what changed and why.
screen2.tip: Optimize, verify, export. Your CV is ready to apply.

step7.title: History
step7.tooltip: üìù Discover all modifications made by AI

step8.title: PDF Export
step8.description: Export your optimized CV to PDF format
step8.tooltip: üìÑ Export your optimized CV to PDF format

screen1.title: Export a CV ready to apply
screen1.description: Generate a professional PDF, in standard format without photo, perfectly readable by recruiters and their ATS tools.
checklist: Universal format recognized by all ATS
Ready to be sent for applications

screen2.title: 100% customizable export
screen2.description: Select what you want to include in your PDF: sections, experiences, education, languages, projects... You decide, we generate.
screen2.tip: A targeted CV = more impact with the recruiter.

onComplete.message: üéâ Congratulations! You now master all the features!

screen1.title: Welcome to FitMyCV üëã
screen1.description: Welcome! This tutorial will teach you the basics to quickly create CVs tailored to each offer.
checklist: A tailored CV for each offer
screen1.atsExplanation: ATS (Applicant Tracking System): software used by recruiters to automatically filter CVs. An ATS-optimized format increases your chances of being seen.

solution.title: Tip
solution.description: Simply paste your offer links, we analyze everything automatically!

screen2.title: Why do your applications go unanswered?

problems.title: Dozens of CVs sent, zero response
problems.description: You spend hours applying but only get silence.

problems.title: Your CV must first convince a software
problems.description: 88% of large companies use ATS systems that analyze structure and keywords before a human sees your CV.

problems.title: Then charm a recruiter in seconds
problems.description: If it passes the filter, a recruiter quickly scans it to decide who to meet.

problems.title: The challenge: succeed at both with a generic CV
problems.description: Mission impossible without adapting your CV to each offer.

solution.title: FitMyCV solves this dual challenge
solution.description: Our AI adapts your CV to pass automatic filters AND capture recruiters' attention. A tailored CV for each offer, in a few clicks, to drastically increase your chances of getting a first interview.

screen3.title: Ready for a 2-minute tour? ‚è±Ô∏è
screen3.subtitle: Discover the 5 features that will change how you apply

features.title: Generate with AI
features.description: CV automatically adapted to each job offer

features.title: Calculate your score
features.description: Measure your compatibility with an offer

screen3.tip: Follow the tour, you'll create your first CV right after!

screen1.title: Congratulations, you're ready!
screen1.description: You now master FitMyCV. Create tailored CVs, calculate your match score, optimize in one click and export professional PDFs.
screen1.highlight: It's time to land your next interview!

screen2.title: Everything you can do now
screen2.description: FitMyCV offers you several ways to create and manage your CVs.

import.title: Import an existing CV
import.description: Add your CVs in PDF or Word, AI adapts them to the optimized format

create.title: Create a blank CV
create.description: Start from scratch and build your CV section by section

generate.title: Generate a template CV
generate.description: Type any job title, AI generates a fictional CV to inspire you

delete.title: Delete a CV
delete.description: Clean up your CVs in one click

screen2.tip: Tip: The search bar also works with fictional titles to explore new careers!

screen3.title: Coming soon to FitMyCV
screen3.description: We're not stopping there. Here's what's coming soon to help you land your dream job.

comingSoon.title: Offer Analysis
comingSoon.description: Understand exactly what the recruiter is looking for

screen3.tip: Have a feature idea? Let us know!
